subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The catalog task generates HTML documentation about the component types defined a supplied scope.

section.name: Example

p.i: Example build file that uses the catalog task:

section.pre:
<project name="dpml-http" default="install" basedir="." xmlns:transit="antlib:net.dpml.transit" xmlns:x="dpml:depot" xmlns:c="dpml:metro">
<transit:import uri="local:template:dpml/tools/standard"/>
<target name="build" depends="standard.build">
<x:plugin uri="link:plugin:dpml/metro/dpml-metro-tools"/>
<c:catalog> <fileset dir="${basedir}"> <include name="**/target/classes/main/**/*.type"/> </fileset> </c:catalog>
</target>
</project>
